document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Today </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">noon </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">She </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">dwelt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">close </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">almost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">touched </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Tonight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">she </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">lies </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Past </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">neighborhood </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">bough </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">steeple </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">past </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">surmise </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Today or this noon
